level.heading: Resumption of business.
level.text: ยง 20-318 Resumption of business. No person shall, upon the conclusion of any sale as defined in subdivision one of section 20-308 of this subchapter, continue to conduct a business or business operation of the same or similar nature to that for the discontinuance of which such license was issued at the same premises nor, within one year after the conclusion of such sale, resume such business at such same premises.
